mapper.select: select n.id as n_id, n.name as n_name, n.category_id as n_category_id, n.created_date as n_created_date, c.name as c_name from notebook as n inner join category as c on n.category_id = c.id where n.id = #{0}

select n.id as n_id, n.name as n_name, n.category_id as n_category_id, n.created_date as n_created_date, c.name as c_name from notebook as n inner join category as c on n.category_id = c.id where n.id > (#{0}-1)*#{1} order by n.id asc desc limit #{1}
